reviewText: Great movie trilogy. Very interesting. One of my favorites.
Good series.  Really enjoyed all of them but sometimes had trouble hearing/understanding the dialogue, and mine didn't have closed captions.
Yes we loved how fast we got them an how great they were
It was a birthday present for my husband.  He loves the Sniper movies.

All were well done and great acting staff and each with a slight twist but the same theme.  Realize how long it has been since first Sniper movie and just how much older Tom Berenger but to me a great actor for the main character theme.

We bought these because we like these kind of movies ,but they also said they had Closed Captioning ! They do not so if you are hearing impaired and need CC to enjoy a movie do not buy these. :(  We are thinking of sending them back because of false advertising .
Very. Nice. U. Get. All. 4. Movies. In. One.  Package
Arrived in good time. Quality great. Glad to see all four of these classics together on the same dvd pack.would reccomend this seller to everyone.
Tom Berenger does a great job in these movies.
Love the sniper series movies. Nice to have them added to my home collection.

If you are really into the Sniper movies you will love this one.  We watch them over & over again.

Great series. 4 for the price of 1 is unbeatable. Great story great acting
What can I say???  It works.......
I loved it because I enjoy the Sniper character and have always been a fan of Tom Beranger; If you are not both you will bet bored quickly.
Berenger was made to play these Soldier roles. Very convincingly I might add. They are all entertaining. I did however,like the 1st one the best.

Still, it's a series so somebody must like it.  Maybe it's an age thing.

A really low budget might be involved too.

I have always liked this series of movies as there are plenty of blood and guts.  And I can almost smell the burnt gun powder and felt the sweat running down my back from my days in Basic Training in 1969-70 as I trained to go to RVN although I did not have to go.  Quite a bit of it was realistic although the total amount of success might be somewhat unrealistic.  All in all, though, I can identify with the general grunt part of it.  I also grew up on stories of WWII in the South Pacific as my dad was in the Sea Bees for four years on Guan, Guadal Canal, Tulagi, and others of the Solomon Islands.  War is awful.  War is difficult.  War defines some of us more than others.  Killing is part of war so a sniper can be the ultimate warrior.  I find much to be admired in their dedication to excellence although being an excellent killer is certainly not to be admired by all of us.  Anyway, these are good movies for the genre, although some will find them tiresome.  Not me, though.
all 4sniper movies on 2 discs for a cheap price great dvd set

These dvds do have Closed Captions.  Some people have had trouble getting closed captions and think it doesnt support  it. In order to get the CC, you need to select the CC on your tv remote control. Then you need to have your dvd or blu ray player connected to you tv with RCA video audio cables ( the yellow, red, white connections). You can NOT have it connected with an HDMI cable because HDMI does not support the Closed Caption signal. Yeah I know it sucks, it would have been nice and easier if all the movies had subtitles instead I think only the forth movie has the option. Hope this helps some one out. Some other movie dvds might not be labeled on the back of the cases as having subtitles or even CC but using this connection method you might get lucky and actually get CC on some that were not advertised.
This was also purchased for my friend who without him, I would be in a lot of trouble with my disability! I pray he enjoys this, as he loves war movies!
